```{r}
library(dplyr)
source('plot_func.R')

data <- readr::read_csv('network_attributes.csv') %>% 
  filter(Id != '牙醫學系')
data$transfer_group <- as.factor(data$groups_transfer)
```


## Degree

```{r}
plot_xy(data, x = data$`job_1st-2nd`, 
        y = data$ntuApplic_degree,
        xlab = '工作變動性 (1st Job vs. 2-5 年)',
        ylab = '學測網絡 degree') %>% print()
```


```{r}
plot_xy(data, x = data$`job_2nd-3rd`, 
        y = data$ntuApplic_degree,
        xlab = '工作變動性 (2-5 年 vs. 5-10 年)',
        ylab = '學測網絡 degree') %>% print()
```


```{r}
plot_xy(data, x = data$`industr_1st-2nd`, 
        y = data$ntuApplic_degree,
        xlab = '產業變動性 (1st Job vs. 5-10 年)',
        ylab = '學測網絡 degree') %>% print()
```


```{r}
plot_xy(data, x = data$`industr_2nd-3rd`, 
        y = data$ntuApplic_degree,
        xlab = '產業變動性 (2-5 年 vs. 5-10 年)',
        ylab = '學測網絡 degree') %>% print()
```


## PageRank

```{r}
plot_xy(data, data$`job_1st-2nd`, data$ntuApplic_pageranks,
          xlab = '工作變動性 (1st Job vs. 2-5 年)') %>% print()
```

```{r}
plot_xy(data, data$`job_2nd-3rd`, data$ntuApplic_pageranks,
        xlab = '工作變動性 (2-5 年 vs. 5-10 年)',
        ylab = '學測網絡 PageRank') %>% print()
```


```{r}
plot_xy(data, data$`industr_1st-2nd`, data$ntuApplic_pageranks,
        xlab = '產業變動性 (1st Job vs. 2-5 年)',
        ylab = '學測網絡 PageRank') %>% print()
  
```


```{r}
cor2 <- round(cor(data$`industr_2nd-3rd`, data$ntuApplic_pageranks), 3)
```

(ref:cor2) 相關係數：`r cor2`

```{r fig.cap='(ref:cor2)'}

```
